thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 23 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Says U.S. FDA Issued Form 483 With 3 Observations For Halol Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Says U.S. FDA Issued Form 483 With 3 Observations For Halol Facility

organizations.name: brief-sun pharmaceutical industries says u.s. fda

text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd :
* SUN PHARMACEUTICAL INDUSTRIES -U.S. FDA CONDUCTED GMP INSPECTION OF HALOL FACILITY (GUJARAT, INDIA) FROM FEBRUARY 12-23, 2018
* AT CONCLUSION OF INSPECTION, AGENCY ISSUED A FORM 483, WITH THREE OBSERVATIONS
* SUN PHARMACEUTICAL INDUSTRIES - CO PREPARING RESPONSE TO FDA OBSERVATIONS, TO BE SUBMITTED WITHIN 15 BUSINESS DAYS Source text - bit.ly/2EXxdbY Further company coverage:
